violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer provided name 'Алексей' at 5.867-6.587s. Operator responded 'Чем могу помочь?' at 7.247-8.047s without repeating the name back or requesting confirmation ('Верно?'). Echo method requires both repeat-back and explicit confirmation.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for customer name
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When customer provides their name, immediately repeat it back and ask for confirmation: 'Алексей, верно?' and wait for customer's confirmation ('Да', 'Верно', etc.)

coaching_priorities.issue: Customer name not used during conversation
coaching_priorities.recommendation: After collecting customer's name, use it periodically during the conversation to build rapport and demonstrate attentiveness

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting with company name '74 колеса', operator name 'Александра', and offer to help. Proper closing with 'Всего доброго'. Customer orientation question 'чем дальше я могу помочь?' at 119.256s.

7.2.evidence: Name 'Алексей' collected at 5.867-6.587s without echo confirmation. City 'Екатеринбург' repeated but without confirmation request. Tire size '185, 65, 14' properly echoed with confirmation.
7.2.note: Primary violation - name not echoed back with confirmation

7.3.evidence: Intro at 0.447s (< 5s requirement). Outro timing acceptable.

6.1.evidence: Search duration 16.231s, well under 45s threshold. Customer did not hang up.

9.1.evidence: Search duration 16.231s from 52.087s to 68.318s, under 40s threshold

9.3.evidence: Operator thanked customer: 'Благодарю вас за ожидание' at 68.878-69.838s

3.1.evidence: Customer requested tire availability information. Operator provided complete answer: price (4110 rubles), availability (tomorrow at 10am), locations (Шерстку и Триэм, Хераклим и Дерибиной). Customer satisfied.

3.6.evidence: Operator performed system search before providing information ('Сейчас, смотри минуту, пожалуйста')

5.1.evidence: All requested information provided: tire specifications, price, availability, delivery time, and locations

10.2.evidence: Information provided per script, logical presentation maintained

10.3.evidence: Professional dialogue maintained, proper opening and closing. Customer name collected but not used during conversation.
10.3.note: Minor improvement opportunity: use customer name during conversation for better rapport

10.6.evidence: Complete and accurate project information delivered

2.1.evidence: No call dropout or service refusal

1.1.evidence: No rudeness or profanity detected from operator

4.1.evidence: Customer was cooperative and polite throughout call
4.1.note: No difficult customer behavior to assess

positive_observations: Excellent search efficiency (16.2 seconds, well under threshold)
Proper gratitude expressed after search ('Благодарю вас за ожидание')
Professional greeting with all required elements (company name, operator name, offer to help)
Tire size properly verified using echo method with confirmation
Complete information provided (price, availability, timing, locations)
Proper closing with customer orientation question

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level timestamps available for precise echo method analysis. Some low-confidence words in transcript but overall quality sufficient for evaluation.
